PROJECT(generate_certificate)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME} ${KSDK_STARTUP_FILE} ${PROJECT_NAME}.c)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    ex_common
    SSS_APIs
)

CREATE_BINARY(${PROJECT_NAME})

PROJECT(generate_certificate_key)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME} ${KSDK_STARTUP_FILE} ${PROJECT_NAME}.c)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(
    ${PROJECT_NAME}
    ex_common
    SSS_APIs
)

CREATE_BINARY(${PROJECT_NAME})
